main.name: Raul Sanz

bio.text: Enthusiastic full stack developer with a strong background in graphic design. I am looking for my next professional opportunity, where I can contribute to building great products using the best engineering practices and make a difference utilising my large web and UX designer experience whilst I continue growing my career and expanding my skill set.
My main areas of expertise include React JS, CSS with Sass, semantic HTML5, static site generators (Gatsby JS), responsive and adaptive web, vanilla Javascript, SEO, web design and web optimisation.

In addition to my developer experience and qualifications, I have spent over ten years of my career working in design, UX and product management for a wide variety of industries such as banking, retail, automobile and food. I am passionate about technology, creativity and innovation. My strengths are project management, collaboration and end-to-end delivery of projects.
